title: Ground News - Liberal Catholic Priest Daniel Horan Rage-Quits Twitter After People Pushed Back On His Pro-Transgender Post
text:
Summary by The Daily Caller Franciscan Fr. Daniel Horan quit Twitter after receiving pushback on a pro-transgender tweet, he wrote for the National Catholic Reporter (NCR). Share menu More
